document_title: Module-Lattice-Based Key-Encapsulation Mechanism Standard (ML-KEM)
short_description: Specifies ML-KEM (Kyber) with three parameter sets (512, 768, 1024) for quantum-resistant key establishment. Errata Oct 2024.
applicable_industries: Generic IT; Finance; Telecom; Government; Healthcare; Critical Infrastructure
ProtocolOrToolImpact: TLS 1.3, QUIC, SSH, IPsec/IKE, CMS key wrapping

document_title: Module-Lattice-Based Digital Signature Standard (ML-DSA)
short_description: Specifies ML-DSA (Dilithium) signature algorithms with three parameter sets (44, 65, 87). Errata Oct 2024.
applicable_industries: IT; Finance; Telecom; Government; Identity Management
ProtocolOrToolImpact: X.509 certificates, TLS authentication, code signing, document signature

document_title: Stateless Hash-Based Digital Signature Standard (SLH-DSA)
short_description: Specifies SLH-DSA (SPHINCS+) stateless hash-based signatures with 12 parameter sets.
applicable_industries: Firmware; Critical Infrastructure; Software Updates; Long-term Archival
ProtocolOrToolImpact: CMS signatures, software signing, long-term archival signing

document_title: FFT over NTRU-Lattice-Based Digital Signature Algorithm (FN-DSA)
short_description: Specifies FN-DSA (FALCON) compact signature algorithm. Expected draft 2026, final 2027.
applicable_industries: Constrained Devices; IoT; Embedded Systems; Mobile

document_title: Digital Signature Standard (DSS)
short_description: Specifies RSA, ECDSA, EdDSA. Removes DSA. Errata May 2025. Transition to PQC planned.

document_title: Recommendation for Stateful Hash-Based Signature Schemes
short_description: Specifies LMS and XMSS stateful hash-based signature schemes for firmware signing.
applicable_industries: Firmware; Embedded Systems; IoT; Boot Security

document_title: Recommendations for Key-Encapsulation Mechanisms
short_description: Guidance for implementing KEMs securely including hybrid KEMs and FIPS 140 validation requirements.
applicable_industries: IT; Finance; Gov; Cloud; HSM Vendors

document_title: Transition to Post-Quantum Cryptography Standards
short_description: Roadmap for transitioning to PQC. Proposes 2030 deprecation and 2035 disallowment of classical asymmetric crypto.

document_title: Status Report on the Fourth Round of the NIST PQC Standardization Process
short_description: Documents HQC selection as fourth PQC standard providing code-based cryptographic diversity.

document_title: Hamming Quasi-Cyclic (HQC) Algorithm Specification
short_description: Code-based KEM selected March 2025 as backup to ML-KEM. Draft FIPS expected 2026, final 2027.

document_title: Using Key Encapsulation Mechanism (KEM) Algorithms in CMS
short_description: Defines CMS KEMRecipientInfo structure for PQ KEMs including ML-KEM.
applicable_industries: IT; Email; Web PKI; Secure Messaging

document_title: Use of the HSS/LMS Hash-Based Signature Algorithm in CMS
short_description: Updated HSS/LMS usage in CMS. Obsoletes RFC 8708.

document_title: Terminology for Post-Quantum Traditional Hybrid Schemes
short_description: Defines terminology for PQ/T hybrid schemes including composite KEMs and signatures.

document_title: Use of HSS and XMSS Hash-Based Signature Algorithms in X.509 PKI
short_description: Defines OIDs and certificate structures for stateful hash-based signatures in X.509.

document_title: Certificate Management Protocol (CMP) Updates for KEM
short_description: Adds KEM key transport to CMP. Obsoletes RFC 4210.

document_title: Use of SLH-DSA in CMS
short_description: Defines SPHINCS+ (SLH-DSA) usage in Cryptographic Message Syntax.

document_title: LMS Algorithm Identifiers for Alternative Hash Functions
short_description: Extends RFC 8554 with SHA-3 and SHAKE hash function options for LMS.

document_title: Algorithm Identifiers for ML-DSA in X.509 PKI
short_description: Defines X.509 OIDs and certificate structures for ML-DSA (Dilithium) signatures.

document_title: Use of ML-DSA in CMS
